entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 27 with temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27 with temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill minus 35 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
